name: Jennifer Housley
text: The receptionist couldn't even find a sales person to help us, they obviously weren't trying to make any money that day we went. We had cash and ready to buy. Seemed snooty. Never going back.

resp.text: We are very sorry you had a negative experience in our showroom. We invite your compassion during this time when staff is spread so thin due to staffing shortages. It is no excuse for not getting the shopping experience we expect for our customers. Thank you for taking the time to give feedback. We will address this with our team.

name: Judy Meyer
text: Great quality furniture.  Very helpful salesman.

resp.text: Judy- Thank you for taking the time to give us a positive review! We appreciate it!

name: Patrick McCormick
text: My family and I have purchased several pieces from Townhouse Galleries in Decatur over the years.  Their furniture is the finest available in north Alabama.  The quality is far superior to anything offered from other retailers. Their selection is great, and they are more than willing to order something to your specifications.  The staff is very friendly and knowledgable, as well.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words Patrick. We appreciate your business and are happy that you find value in the quality of our furniture. We also feel fortunate to have a great team of people.

name: Janice Campbell
text:
Excellent experience. Quality furniture, large selection, salesman was helpful, not one bit of pressure to buy.  It was worth the  90 min drive.
Definitely will go back.

resp.text:
Ms. Campbell,
Thank you for your kind review of our Decatur location. We are glad that you found the drive worthwhile. Please do not hesitate to contact me directly should you need any help in the future.

Best,
Karen Thomas
Owner

name: John Zink
text: I had problems finding a comfortable chair. I ended up returning 2 chairs that were not comfortable for me once I got them home. Penny at Townhouse Galleries was helpful and understanding of my problem.The returns were made without incident. Thank you to all at Townhouse.

resp.text:
Thank you so much John for taking the time to communicate your positive service/return experience with Townhouse Galleries. We are proud of our team and the level of service our family owned and operated company is able to provide. We hope you are able to find a perfect chair!

Thank you,
Karen Thomas

name: Rose Davis
text: Love  the  selection,  even  the delivery  men was kind  and thoughtful,  I will be  visiting  there  again .😆

resp.text: Rose, Thank you so much for your business and kind review. We are glad that our delivery team did a great job for you. They are fantastic!

name: Shelia Tavernier
text: Sift really find what I was looking to buy

resp.text: We are sorry Shelia you weren't able to find what you were looking for on the showroom floor in Decatur.  Be sure to visit our Hunstville location. They might have chairs in stock you like or let us know if you want to custom order. Have a great rest of your weekend and thank you for visiting us!

name: Dana Barton
text: Very nice

resp.text:
Dana,
Thank you for your 4 start review and for shopping at our Decatur location!

name: Alecia Murphy
text: Great rugs super friendly customer service.

name: Jason Nuwayhid
text: Wow!!! This place is amazing! Best rugs in Alabama. All hand made. My family has 5 of these rugs and looking to buy more.

name: Lance G
text: Excellent selection. Incredible knowledge and professional. Great experience.

name: Michele Smith
text: Sam was amazing! I have a silk Persian rug that I needed cleaned and repaired. He referred me to Admiral Carpet Cleaners who came to my house to pick up my rug. When it was finished the cleaning company took my rug to Sam for him to repair the binding. He was quick and efficient. You can’t even tell my rug has been repaired. It’s beautiful! The cost was very affordable and the job was professional! I would recommend Caravan Imports to everyone! Ask for Sam!! Wonderful place to do business!!

name: Kelly Ruka
text: Chad is very professional and thorough. I recommend floor medic to all!

name: Mary Alice Nelson
text: So glad to discover Floor Medic!  Fast and very good service from Malcolm.  My carpet, area rug and an oriental rug which was picked up here and returned, all look like new! Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs Nelson!

name: Kerry McCullough
text: Their response time is so fast.  They are efficient and professional.  Highly recommend.  They do an amazing job cleaning carpets.

resp.text: Thank you Kerry!  We appreciate your business.

name: Rachel Coggins
text: This was the first time that I used Floor Medic and I am very grateful that I used their service. They were able to fit me in within 2 days with a time that accommodated my schedule. Brett arrived and started straight to work. I told him that I had cats that were confined to one room that was not being cleaned today. He thanked me for letting him know that there were animals in the house. Even though they were not a risk of running, he was very considerate of my animals. That meant the world to me! Brett was super professional, very fast and removed every problem spot that I had. Saying that I am a satisfied customer is an understatement. Thank you so much to Chad and Brett for their amazing customer service. I will definitely use Floor Medic again

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Corinna Luce
text: Not only did they do a great job on the carpets, they also followed up to be sure I was satisfied.  I can't remember the last time a service provider did that.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs Luce!

name: Shirley Miles
text:
When I called the expectations were to have it done ( rug cleaning) quick .  They were
Over and above my expectations
Thank you for professionalism and kindness .

name: Dean watson
text:
Hats off to Chad and his team … We needed our floors cleaned asap and Floor medic was able to not only meet but exceed our expectations …
I would definitely recommend this cleaning service above all others … Great Job guys !

resp.text: Thanjk you Dean!  We appreciate your business!

name: Diamond Wash by Softwash Pros Doug Houston
text: Chads guys came out to my house to clean my carpets. I’ve used Chad at Floor Medic for a few years. They are always on time courteous and professional. They work around my schedule to accommodate my time slot requests. I will continue to use them in the future and highly recommend Floor Medic.

resp.text: Thank you Doug. We appreciate you guys!

name: Sim Sokom
text: Chad and floor medic have been spectacular. We had a pipe burst and they were able to save the hardwood floors and saw the project til the end. We also had them clean and stretch the carpet and clean our sofa and loveseat, all with great result. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thanks Sim.  We enjoyed working for you.

name: Kelley Michele
text: Chad and his crew is always timely and do a fantastic job for us.  We happily use them exclusively at our community.

resp.text: Thank you Kelley -- we appreciate you guys!

name: Hudson Sandefur
text: Had a flood in my home due to a broken water line.  Floor Medic was here within an hour and with their system was able to save my hardwood floors, saving me thousands of $$.  Since then they have done more work cleaning carpets and rugs.  Great service and results.  Highly recommend Floor Medic.

name: robert smith
text: Always on time, efficient, professional, competitive and clean carpet  every six months for 7 years. Also used recently in home and same great results

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate you guys!

name: Angela Wright
text: I've been doing business with Floor Medic for well over 5 years!  I manage an apartment community and they do an awesome job on our carpets, always going the extra mile!  He not only cleans our carpets but does water extraction when needed.  We've had apartments flooded out and Chad and his crew are always on the spot fast to help with the clean up.  I couldn't ask for better service!

resp.text: Thank you thank you thank you!

name: JD Weir
text: Chad and his crews are always professional and prompt!  His prices are always way beyond fair for the work they provide.  We have used his service on multiple occasions (as we have pets, parties, and kids), and each time the work is phenomenal!  Give Floor Medic a call for your floor, or upholstery, cleaning needs  -- you will be glad you did!

name: M Young
text: I am SO pleased. I took my husband's recliner to Floor-Medic to be cleaned after our cat had an accident on it. I only had hopes that the stain would be minimized. Never did I imagine that I would be returned a chair that appears in almost brand-new condition! Professional and customer friendly, Floor-Medic is the name I will recommend most heartily to all my friends needing upholstery cleaning. Thank you, Chad!

resp.text: Thank you. It's a pleasure to work for you.

name: Roger Murphy
text: Very professional and reliable company, one of the best in the industry! I highly recommend Floor Medic for your Water extraction and restoration needs!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Murphy!

name: mary morrison
text: Best carpet/usholstery cleaning experience I’ve ever had! Brett, the technician, was very professional and all equipment extremely clean.

resp.text: Thank you very much.  We appreciate your kind words and business!

name: Harry Brooks
text: Excellent service. Exceeded my expectations. definitely recommend

resp.text: Thank you Mr Brooks.  We appreciate your business!

name: Heather Nelson
text: Very pleased with the customer service and the results we received from everyone at Floor Medic. Our carpets and upholstery look like new. I will be using Floor Medic again and will be referring them to all of my friends and family!

resp.text: Thank you. We appreciate you.

name: Andrea Krebs
text: Chad has been our carpet cleaner for years.  He shows up when he says he will, with or without utilities on at the property, and always does and excellent job.  His crew is very polite and professional.  We will be continuing to use him for all our carpet cleaning.

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate your business and enjoy working for you!

name: Lad Drago
text: Great job on my office carpets.  Very reasonable pricing.  I will use Floor Medic again.

resp.text: Thanks Lad.  We appreciate your business.

name: Steve Ascik
text: This is by far the very best service I've found  on the eastern shore .  Professional, courteous, thorough. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you. We appreciate you.

name: fazekas796
text: Great company with top notice service. Highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thanks Jimmy.

name: Mandy Pitts
text: As the leasing agent with Ashley Gates, I can honestly say we could not be happier with the excellent service the Chad and Floor Medic provides.

resp.text: Thank you.  We enjoy working for you guys.

name: Carl David Winners
text: I was amazed at the effective removal of all pet stains and odors from the rental property we worked on, highly recommended.  CW

name: Boudreaux'sCajunGrill Daphne
text: This building has been around for 40+ years!  These guys know their stuff!  The tile they cleaned has never looked better!  Thanks!

resp.text: Thanks Boudreaux's!  We appreciate you!

name: Paul Low
text: Been using them for years..... always outstanding

resp.text: Thank you Mr Low -- you guys are a pleasure to work for!

name: Ty DeLoach
text: Wonderful experience Malcolm was fantastic and courteous!

resp.text: Thank you very much.  We appreciate your business.

name: Adam Harmeier
text: Chad and his professional staff have cleaned over 25 houses for me in the past year. They have exceeded our expectations on everyone!!

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate your business!

name: Pel Henry
text: Did a great job!! highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thanks Pel - we appreciate your business.

name: Brett Flowers Cole
text: I had been sent to Nilipour on a recommendation and it did not disappoint! We had a rug that was in rough shape between pets and sitting at a house under construction open to the elements for months! Nilipour cleaned up the rug good as new! They were thorough, communicated clearly throughout the process and were very nice! Would recommend, and we will be back!

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Cole,
Thank you for these amazing words spoken over our family business and the work we did on your rug.  We know you are going to enjoy it even more now!  We appreciate the opportunity and the trust and hope to see you once again!  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!
Bless you!
The Nilipour Family

name: Sarah Dunn
text:
Nilipour did a wonderful job of cleaning and mending my most "well-loved" rug, which I have now retired from the floor so that it can be displayed on the wall behind my bed!

I returned a couple of months later and took advantage of a sale to procure two beautiful pieces that I love!

Soraya Nilipour is especially good at suggesting pieces based on the size of the area and can go off of photographs of your existing items to find a wonderful match for your decor and budget.  I had the pleasure of meeting and speaking with the whole family during my most recent visit, and could not have had a better experience anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sarah Dunn!  You have been such a delight to work with and I appreciate the freedom you gave to me to speak freely of suggestions.  We love what we do here at the shop, whether it is servicing a customer's rugs or finding the perfect rugs for their needs!  Meeting the needs of customers is my favorite part of who I am here and I am grateful I got to meet and work with you!  Thank you for the kind words over our business and I will look forward to your visit once again!

name: Diane Thomas
text: My husband and I had a wonderful experience shopping and buying our oriental rug from the Nilipour family.  Their selection of styles, colors, sizes and prices is excellent.    And we received expert advice on choosing a rug that would be complimentary to our modern Missoni rug.  They have been in business for almost 50 years which is a testament to the value and quality of their rugs and their excellent customer service.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Thomas,
Thank you to both you and Dr. Thomas for taking the time to come into our showroom while you were visiting Birmingham.  We enjoyed meeting and working with you and are thrilled that you are enjoying your rug.  We are so very grateful for the business but are in awe over your kind words written over our family business and appreciate your sharing your wonderful experience!  Please let us know if you need anything further!
Always,
The Nilipour Family

name: Jessica Kubat
text: Love shopping with Nilipour. Amazing selection of rugs and even better service. Soraya and her family are the best around!

resp.text:
Dear Jessica,
Thank you for coming in and shopping with us!  You and your husband are delightful to work with and easy to serve!  You enjoy your beautiful Oushak Rug and we will be ready to see you in a few weeks for rug cleaning!  IWe are here if you need anything in the meantime!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: William
text:
My wife & I had a 9 x 11 Tabriz that just wasn't working with our living room remodel project. We took it to Soraya, who gave us a great trade price towards a rug in her gallery.

She was quite knowledgeable. Together with an assistant, they worked tirelessly to help us find exactly what we were looking for. We are very happy with our purchase.

Our future rug purchases will begin (and likely end) at Nilipour.

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Edwards,
Thank you for the kind words.  We enjoyed meeting and working with both you and your wife throughout the process of your oriental rug trade and purchase!  You came in prepared knowing what you needed, both size and color palette, so finding that beautiful area rug, Oushak, to complete your family room was an easy task since you two agreeably made your selection!  Enjoy your rug and know we will be looking forward to serving you again and again!  By the way, you were a trooper in helping us flip the rugs while other customers needed our help as well...😉
Many Blessings,
The Nilipour Family
Soraya

name: Lisle Nabell
text: Superb service and wonderful in depth knowledge of the rugs; I have purchased from them and brought my rugs back for cleaning with outstanding service very consistently.

resp.text:
Dear Ms. Nabell,
Thank you for these amazing words spoken over our family business.  We are so honored that you would take the time to share your experience in such detail!  We are truly grateful and very blessed to have you as a customer and hope you enjoy all of your rugs freshly cleaned.  You make our days more full!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Theresa Crowgey
text: We had a wonderful experience here and will definitely be back for more! Everyone was incredibly friendly and helpful (especially as I'm very indecisive and wanting a large rug - and these rugs are heavy!).We could not have had a better experience- from matching our design aesthetic with several beautiful options to practical advice to help narrow down our selection to loading everything in the car- the service and selection were exceptional. The price is also far better than some of the other vendors we've explored and there are plenty of options for every price point!

resp.text:
Dear Theresa,
Wow!  We are blown away by your kind words over our family business.  You and your husband were fun to work with and you did such an amazing job at selecting what you ultimately knew would fit your space!  We simply guided you to the right size and general color desire...  😉  Thank you for the compliments on our services, selection and prices!  Enjoy your rugs and come again!
Blessings, The Nilipour Family

name: jane reed
text: I have used Nilipour for my rug cleaning needs twice, and both times, I was very pleased with the results and the customer service. I would highly recommend.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Reed,
Thank you for the kind words spoken over our family business and the compliment over our rug cleaning services.  We are thrilled that you are pleased with the results during both occasions!  We hope you enjoy your rugs freshly cleaned and we will look forward to serving you in the future!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Marian Wilson
text: I took an old rug here to be repaired and without permission Gorilla tape was put on the back to hold together weak areas.  It is impossible to remove  the tape without destroying some fibers.  I was told I could put Goof off on the tape, which I believe is a petroleum product.  Surely Goof Off is not recommended for antique fibers and  I would have to have the rug cleaned again to get the Goof Off removed.  I feel violated.  Surely they should have asked my permission before they did this.  I expected sewing and patching, not tape.  I am very disappointed and angry.

name: P Dou
text:
Wonderful shopping experience, high quality rugs in a wide range of price ranges.  We were able to purchase a rug that was far superior to department store rugs, and was exactly what we wanted. They were very understanding of our budget needs, and the whole experience was very relaxed.

We expect to purchase a rug for another room in the future, and Nilipour is the only place we're going to shop for it!

resp.text:
Dear Sir,
Thank you for the most kind words over our family business!  We truly enjoyed meeting you and wife and helping you to select the right rug for your room!  We are thrilled that you are so pleased with your purchase and we appreciate the opportunity to serve you.  We look forward to seeing you and your wife in the future wether for another rug purchase or rug cleaning!
Many Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Laurel Stiff
text: Fantastic experience with Soraya at Nilipour. They have such a wonderful selection of rugs and she happily gave me details about the origin and process for those I was interested in. We landed on a fabulous Oushak that we will treasure for years!

resp.text:
Dear Laurel,
Thank you for the amazing words over our family business!  You were such a delight to work with!  You are right...you did land on a GORGEOUS Oushak!  Enjoy your rug and come and see us any time!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Megan Zeski
text: Soraya was a wonderful help when we were looking for a rug for our living room.  She was very patient and took the time to show us numerous options that fell within our budget.  We could not be more pleased with our choice.  The quality is top-notch, the colors and pattern are perfect, and the rug is the perfect complement to our new home.  Highly recommend Soraya and the Nilipour family!

resp.text:
Dear Megan,
Thank you for the kindest words over our family business!  We enjoyed meeting and working with you two very much and I know you will enjoy your transitional Oushak for many years to come...you selected it!  Please let us know if you ever need anything further and ALWAYS feel welcome to come in!  Many thanks and blessings to you and your new home!
Thank you,
The Nilipour Family

name: Erika R
text: After looking online and in other local stores, we were so pleased with what we found at Nilipour! As a small family owned business, the level of friendliness and attention was unmatched. The quality and selection of rugs was wonderful. We walked out with two rugs that we love! We will definitely shop there again.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Raper,
Thank you to both you and Dr. Raper for taking the time to come into our family showroom!  We truly enjoyed meeting and working with you in helping you to select the right rugs for your home!  We love how you came in prepared with knowing what you wanted and what sizes you needed...  You even jumped in and helped flip rugs...;-)  You made our job too easy!  We hope you and your family enjoy your hand knotted Serapi Oriental Rugs for many years to come and please let us know if you need anything further.  Thank you again for the business and we look forward to seeing you another time.
Many Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Nicole Hedrick
text: What an amazing experience!  I walked in and received immediate personal attention. It’s like they knew what I was looking for, and I walked out the door 20 min later with a brand new rug. (Well they actually scotch-guarded it for me so pick up the next day) Nilipour had it all rolled up where it fit super easily in my car. Thank you for making me feel special and part of the family!

resp.text:
Dear Nicole,
Thank you for taking the time to visit our showroom!  I enjoyed meeting and working with you and appreciate that your trusted me to help you make your living room rug choice decision!  I know you are going to enjoy it for many years to come... and come back for more...　  Thank you for expressing your experience as we do make the effort to make the process fun and at your pace!  We look forward to your next visit and let us know if you need anything further!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Linda M
text: Absolutely love my rugs.  Great customer service.   They definitely know their rugs and can answer all your questions.   They always have a great selection.  The best!!!

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Marcrum,
We appreciate your genuine review over our family business!  We enjoyed seeing you once again and hope you are enjoying your freshly cleaned and serviced oriental rug!  We do have a passion for what we do here and always look forward to serving customers whether with the cleaning and restoration of oriental rugs or with finding the right rugs from our selection for a special home or office space.  We appreciate you very much and look forward to seeing and working with you in the near future!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Stephen Briggs
text: Simply the best! If you are looking for beautiful, top quality, oriental rugs this is your place. Not only are the rugs beautiful but customer service is second to none. They patiently looked through several rugs with us until we found the right one for us. We have now bought 4 rugs from this store and cannot recommend it enough! Thanks again for all your help!

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Briggs,
Thank you for your very kind words!  We enjoyed working with you and your wife in showing you our selection.  You two selected some of the most beautiful oriental rugs...Oushak, Kazak and a Persian Sarab!  We hope you enjoy them with all of your family activities and send all of your friends our way!  We will look forward to working with you whenever you have a need for another rug!
Many Thanks,
The Nilipour Family

name: David Gentry
text: Your first impression of the showroom will be one of opulence.  You are walking into an upscale Persian marketplace.  You will find the beauty of these rugs indescribable.  The owners are extremely knowledgeable.  They will love to teach you and answer any questions you have.  For your own good, don't buy an oriental rug without visiting Nilipour Oriental Rugs.  You will be glad you did.

name: James Blumentritt
text: I took a rug in to get cleaned, it was old and a little smelly.  It took a week and when I got the rug back it was like a brand new rug, no odor what so ever other than smelling like a wool rug is supposed to smell.  They did a great job and turn around time was great!  I will be using them again in the future.  Thanks so much!

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Blumentritt,
We are thrilled that you are so satisfied with the cleaning and enzyme deodorizing of your family oriental rug!  Thank you for the kind words over our family business and our rug cleaning services.  We love that we can be surrounded by rugs each day and to be able to help others understand more about their rugs!  Cleaning, restoring, appraising, mothproofing, scotch guarding and enzyme treating are key in maintaining any rug as they are investments!  Meeting and working with you in the process of having your area rug cleaned was our pleasure and we look forward to serving you in the future!  Let us know if you need anything further.
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Lauren Bates Hyde
text: We came in not knowing what to expect but had a general idea of what we wanted. Soraya made it easy to narrow our decision, even though they have an extensive selection of rugs. Everything about our experience was positive and now we own a beautiful new rug!

resp.text:
Dear Lauren,
Thank you to both you and Foster for taking the time to come into our showroom!  We really enjoyed working with you two and are thrilled to know you are loving your all natural hand knotted oriental rug.  Your Serapi is a master piece in your living room and I know you will enjoy it for many years to come!  Remember that we are full service with cleaning, repairing, mothproofing, scotch guarding and so much more when you are ready to have your area rug maintained.  We look forward to seeing you on your next rug venture!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: David Gentry
text: Your first impression of the showroom will be one of opulence.  You are walking into an upscale Persian marketplace.  You will find the beauty of these rugs indescribable.  The owners are extremely knowledgeable.  They will love to teach you and answer any questions you have.  For your own good, don't buy an oriental rug without visiting Nilipour Oriental Rugs.  You will be glad you did.

name: MattStephanie Strother
text:
We are new to the Birmingham area, and based on the positive reviews, chose Nilipour to clean and repair our 5’ x 8’ woven area rug.
We had a great experience from start to finish.  The staff at Nilipour were professional and friendly.  We agreed on a price for the cleaning and repair and an estimate on when the rug would be completed.
The rug was completed within the time estimated and Nilipour contacted us to let us know the rug was completed and ready for pickup.
The rug looks like new and we would definitely recommend Nilipour to others for rug cleaning and repair.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Strother,
Thank you for such kind words over our family business!  We enjoyed meeting you and are so pleased to know you had such a great experience in working with us!  Thank you for letting us know that you are satisfied with our customer service as well as the cleaning and repair work done to your rug.  Enjoy your freshly cleaned oriental rug and we welcome you back any time, whether for cleaning services or even to look at purchasing from our showroom.  Thank you again for coming in and sharing your positive experience with us!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Colleen Sanders
text: The Nilipour Rug folks were great!  Very accommodating as to dates to pick up, came on time, even listed furniture to get the rug out.  The rug looks good as new.  Would definitely use again and recommend to others

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Sanders,
Thank you for your kind words over our services!  We enjoyed coming out to your home and helping you with the cleaning your rug.  We are pleased to know you are happy with our efforts and appreciate the recommendation!  We hope you enjoy your freshly cleaned, enzyme treated and scotch guarded rug and call us if you should need anything else!  We will be here to serve!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Meredith Harris
text: Soraya and her parents are so welcoming and make me feel like family any time I'm in their store.  The rugs are hand picked and absolutely beautiful, no one else compares to the quality they offer!

resp.text:
Dear Meredith,
Thank you for the kind words over our family business.  We love to know that you feel so welcomed when you come in and that you appreciate the quality oriental rugs that we carry!  Come again...  We love it!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Kris Toffel
text: Great service, timely arrival and super customer service!!  I highly recommend using Nilipour to clean your rugs.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Toffel,
Thank you for your kind words and recommendation!  We enjoyed meeting and working with you and are thrilled you are enjoying your freshly cleaned rugs.  Let us know if you need anything further and we will be more than happy to serve...;-)  🤗
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: General Chaos
text: Great place. The service was top notch

resp.text:
Thank you for your kind words.  We are glad you enjoyed your visit and thank you for the opportunity to serve you!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Emily Allen
text: It was a pleasure the moment we entered the show room. They helped us make a good decision. And we now have a beautiful rug that we are very proud of, the selection and pricing made our decision easy.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Allen,
It was a pleasure to work with you and Mr. Allen in helping you to select the right oriental rug for your room!  We enjoyed meeting you and look forward to serving you two again whether with having one of your rugs cleaned or with the purchase of another area rug.  Please let us know if we can do anything further!  Enjoy your rug!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Darcy Mosley
text: Soraya truly made buying rugs a wonderful experience for us. She is so knowledgeable and forthcoming with all of the information about each rug that we looked at. We are very thankful to have Nilipour nearby!

resp.text:
Dear Darcy,
We appreciate your kindest words over our family business!  You and your husband are a treat to work with and finding rugs for your new home was so much fun!  You two did select the most wonderful Oushaks Rugs that are going to be timeless for years to come!  We hope you and your growing family will enjoy your new vintage rugs and come back to see us for any other rug needs you may have...whether for purchasing more or for oriental rug cleaning!  We will always look forward to serving you two!
Blessings,
Tha Nilipour Family

name: R 1
text: Highly recommend. Customer service is the best. Selection, quality and price fantastic. I have bought three rugs here  apart and each time I have done business here was treated like a valued customer.

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Tolbert,
Thank you for your kind review!  We always enjoy seeing and working with you and Mrs. Tolbert.  Your taste is impressive each time you come in!  We appreciate the business and hope you enjoy all of your rugs...  If and when you are ready to have your rugs cleaned, we will be happy to help you!  We recommend this to be done at least every five years or sooner if in a higher traffic area.  We can also mothproof and scotch guard and enzyme treat in case your doggies have had an accident...;-)  Thank you again!
The Nilipour Family

name: Gina Locklear
text: The best. Extremely knowledgeable about how my rugs needed to be cleaned and stored. Very nice family, I am happy to support their business and wouldn't take my rugs anywhere else!

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Locklear,
Thank you for your very kind words over our family business and the services we offer!  We are thrilled that you are satisfied with our work and appreciate your recommendation and support.  We are so blessed to have amazing customers like you who make us want to take pride in our oriental rug cleaning, mothproofing, scotch guarding, enzyme treating and oriental rug repairs!  We look forward to serving you once again...whether to have another rug cleaned or with a purchase!  Thank you!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Virginia Cochran
text: I had 2  rugs cleaned recently and the service was outstanding!  The rugs are now in pristine condition and thankfully they were able to scotchguard  and add a moth protectant to the rug for storage.  They are so easy to work with and the cleaning was quick and very cost effective!

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Cochran,
Thank you for your kind words!  We enjoyed meeting and working with you are thrilled that you are so pleased with the services we provided.  We are thankful for your business and more than happy to make the repair during the cleaning process of your oriental rug!  We are prepared and like to know that we have not missed anything.  Enjoy your freshly cleaned rug and know we look forward to serving you again!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Judy Shelton
text: They knew exactly what I needed.  Gave great advice and immediate service!  Lovely  people to work with!

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Shelton,
Thank you for such KIND words over our family business!  We enjoyed your visit and we were happy to act promptly to help you with your rug cleaning needs.  We welcome you into our showroom any time whether you are looking for rugs or advice and look forward to serving you in any way!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Julie Price
text: Quick, high quality rug cleaning and repair.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Price,
Thank you for such great words over our services!  We appreciate you and the opportunity to have done the cleaning and repairing on your oriental rug.  Let us know if you need anything and we will be more than happy to serve!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Çathy Skrede
text: Nilipour Oriental Rugs did an excellent job cleaning and repairing  my oriental rug. They kept me informed of the process and completed the job ahead of schedule. I will highly recommend them. Customer service was fantastic!!

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Skrede,
Thank you for trusting us to help you with the cleaning, mothproofing, enzyme deodorizing and repair of your oriental rug!  We enjoyed meeting and working with you and Mr. Skrede and hope you and your family enjoy your freshly serviced Serapi Oriental Rug.  We appreciate the kind words you have spoken over our family business and look forward to seeing you come again any time, whether for a future purchase or a cleaning of your area rugs!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Holly James
text: Very knowledgeable and super friendly staff!  Beautiful rugs and great prices!  Bought 6 my first time! Also had them clean my huge (12x18) Tabriz and area rugs. Highly recommend.

resp.text:
Dear Ms. James!  Thank you for your kind review and sweet words over our business!  We enjoyed coming out to your home and helping you with the servicing of your oriental rugs...cleaning, repairing, restoring, scotchgarding, mothproofing and enzyme treating !  We also appreciate the opportunity to have found you a new rug for your home!   Enjoy your new rug and all of the cleaned rugs and please let us know if you need anything further!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Peggy King
text: Nilipour Orential Rugs is owned by very helpful courteous people. Susan was very helpful in helping me redecorate our home. The whole staff was also very helpful in cleaning and repairing several other rugs we have purchased from them. I would highly recommend them to all my friends they were so good to come out get our rugs clean them and bring them back and to help make sure all of our color schemes blended.

resp.text: Dear Mrs. King! Thank you for your kind review and sweet words over our business! You and your husband were a delight to work with and we look forward to serving you anytime... Remember, we are full service and will take good care of you in the cleaning, repairing, restoring, scotchgarding, mothproofing and enzyme treating of your oriental rugs! Enjoy your rugs and let us know if you need anything further! Blessings, The Nilipour Family

name: Jiaqi Xu
text: I highly recommended this store if you would like to have a nice hand knotted rug. The owners are very knowledgeable, and patient.

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Xu,
Thank you for your kind words!  We so enjoyed meeting you, your wife and son.  We hope you and your family enjoy your bedroom even more now with the beautiful hand knotted very fine oriental rug placed in it!  Please let us know if you need anything further and remember that we are full service if you should need to have your rug cleaned or any minor repairs done in the future.  We hope to serve you again!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: judy suther
text: Soraya made shopping such a pleasure! She is very knowledgeable and has a great sense of style. I would definitely shop here again. Thank you!

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Suther,
Thank you for your sweet comments!  I enjoyed meeting you and Mr. Suther.  You two are charming to work with and I appreciate that you are so interested in the nature of our oriental rug business.  I know you will enjoy your Serapi Oriental Rug very much!  Also, thank you for the opportunity to clean, mothproof and do some restoration on your family heirloom rugs.  It was a pleasure to serve you and we look forward to seeing you once again!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Jillian Fitts
text: We have a large hand-woven Persian rug that was once, I'm sure, very beautiful, but throughout the years has been "loved" to pieces.  With a puppy and an elderly dog, this rug has had and will continue to receive unpleasant stains.  Soraya said they could try to clean and do enzyme treatments, but they couldn't guarantee removal of all of the smells.  I agreed to try it since replacing this rug with an equivalent of this size would be upwards of $3000.  They were able to get all the smells out and Susan was able to stitch up the holes.  We are very pleased with our experience at Nilipour Oriental and would recommend their cleaning services, hands down.  I also appreciated how straight-forward, nice and knowledgeable Soraya was and how vast their selection of rugs were; we look forward to purchasing a new rug from them in the future!

resp.text:
Dear Jillian,
Thank you for such a genuinely honest review of our efforts!  There is no denying that we love what we do and appreciate the opportunity to serve.  Cleaning oriental rugs is a huge part of our business and we have been mastering the process for over 45 years.  We have amazing products and our experience has taught us how to treat each rug according to the type that it is and the condition that it is in.  We are grateful for the trust you put into our work even at the straight-forward response of no guarantee of releasing all of the odors or stains in your family heirloom oriental rug.  We look forward to your next trip into our showroom whether it is to have another rug cleaned or for a future purchase!  Our selection of oriental rugs is quite vast and we carry the best of quality to withstand daily use and regular maintenance and the best part is that we do have the very best prices.  That, I will guarantee!  Come any time and we will serve!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Allen Oakman
text: Every time we go into Nilipour Oriental Rugs we are greeted with hugs and teas. We feel like family each and every time. We had no clue that they actually clean rugs for their customers as well. Being one of the largest store fronts in Birmingham they have so many styles to choose from.  Soraya always knowledgable, organized and engaging making sure we leave with a great deal or a clean rug.

resp.text:
Dear Allen,
Thank you so much for your kind words!  We aim to please and we love when you all come in...;-)  You are right...anyone who knows us and they have been coming into our showroom, they will most likely experience a great cup of tea and hugs from me!  You know I'll make sure to find the perfect are rug for your need...contemporary, traditional, vintage, antique or new!  And, we love to help you keep your rugs cleaned and mothproofed so you can pass them down to your children well taken care of...  Anyhow, thank you for recognizing our efforts and we look forward to serving you again and again!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Jerry Robert Key
text: For 15+ years Nilipour Oriental Rugs have cleaned our oriental rugs (8) every year. The Nilipour family and staff's efficiency, knowledge, courtesy and workmanship has always been great.

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Key,
Thank you for your sweet words over our family business!  You and Mrs. Key are so dear to us...  We remember your purchasing your home full of rugs from us years ago!  And, yes, we appreciate that you are so diligent to keep them cleaned, scotch guarded, mothproofed and repaired/restored as needed!  We hope you and your family are enjoying them all freshly cleaned and we look forward to seeing you and serving you once again next year.
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Cheri Collins
text: From the purchasing of quality oriental rugs to the periodic cleaning, and preserving and the occasional maintenance attention, Nilipour Oriental Rugs is the place to go.  The staff is professional, very knowledgable and easy to deal with.  I can't imagine talking my rugs anywhere else.

resp.text:
Dear Cheri,
Thank you for such sweet words over our family business!  I remember the first day you and Ms. Olga came in and I always love serving you all!  We appreciate all of the business you have given to us throughout the purchasing of your oriental rugs and with the cleaning, mothproofing, scotch guarding and enzyme deodorizing.  Remember to come and visit us when you are in Birmingham and know that we will be here to serve you with any cleaning or more rug purchasing/trading needs you may have going forward.  Thank you again for kind review!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Harry Kersten
text: I brought a 20 year old hand sewn turkemon  rug purchased in Saudi Arabia to these guys to have it cleaned. The senior lady appeared to not know what materials were in the rug and disputed the value of the rug based on a written appraisal from 10 yrs ago. This should have been an indication to go elsewhere but since they are the specialists, I trusted them to clean and treat it. When it came time to pick it up, the lady argued with me about how it should be folded and not rolled (despite what I’d been told by the appraiser and all of the literature I could find) and was extremely condescending to me and my wife. We’d already paid the $250 up front when I dropped it off. I’d have to say they don’t seem to be very knowledgeable and lack in customer service. I could not recommend them in good conscience.

name: Doug S
text: A great experience. I bought several amazing rugs for what I thought was a very  reasonable price and saved a ton of time because Soraya and Susan immediately knew the exact rugs that would look and fit the best in different areas of my home. Highly recommend!

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Sappington!  Thank you for your kind review and sweet words over our business!  We have enjoyed working with you and helping you select the right rugs for your home and office...  We also appreciate your trusting us for the cleaning, repairing, restoring, scotchgarding, mothproofing and enzyme treating of your oriental rugs!  Enjoy your rugs and please let us know if you need anything further!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Loren McCoy
text: Always a pleasure to deal with this company!  Beautiful rugs at very fair prices!

resp.text:
Dear Dr. McCoy,
Thank you for the kind words over our family business!  We have enjoyed working with you and your family and are thrilled that you are enjoying your rugs!  We always look forward to seeing you all come into our showroom and helping you to select the your oriental rugs.  We appreciate your business very much and look forward to serving you very soon!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Keylor Chan
text: Enjoyed working with this company.  Courteous, professional, and timely.  Would recommend them.

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Chan,
Thank you for taking the time to give us such a kind review and to recommend our services!  We enjoyed meeting and working with you each time you came in to drop off or pick up your rug.  We try our best to make the process as efficient as possible so you are in and out quickly and not without your area rug for too long...;-)  Oriental Rug cleaning and restoration is a passion of ours!  We hope you and your family enjoy your oriental rug as it is all freshly cleaned.  Please let us know if you should need anything further and we will certainly be happy to serve!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Marian Humphries
text: I bought a very nice rug from a very nice family owned store!

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Humphries,
Thank you for the kind words over our family business.  We enjoyed meeting and working with you and Mr. Humphries in searching out your absolutely stunning Oushak Oriental Rug!  Let us know if you should need anything further and we will be more than happy to serve!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Reel Life Lived
text: Everything about my recent contact with Nilipour was excellent.  From customer service, through cleaning and scotch guarding and enzyme treating of the rug I brought it was great!

resp.text:
Dear Ms. Mouron,
Thank you for such a kind and sincere review over our family business!  You are an absolute delight and serving you and cleaning your rug was what we enjoy doing!  We hope you enjoy having your room come back together and completed with your freshly cleaned oriental rug!  The scotch garding and enzyme deodorizing treatments are great conditioners and bacteria reducers that we really have a lot trust in.  Let us know if you need anything further and we will be sure to serve you in any way!  We look forward to it!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Adam Elliott
text: Great service and pricing. Very helpful and not pushy with sales. Will be back for more!

resp.text:
Dear Adam!  Thank you for your kind review and sweet words over our business!  I enjoyed working with you and helping you select the right rug for your need...  Remember, we are full service and will take good care of you in the  cleaning, repairing, restoring, scotchgarding, mothproofing and enzyme treating of your oriental rugs!  Enjoy your rug and let us know if you need anything further!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Meg Flowers
text: EXCELLENT customer service and quality care for my rug!  Would highly recommend Nilipour!

resp.text:
Dear Meg,
Thank you for your sweet words over our cleaning and customer service!  We are pleased to know that you are satisfied with our services and we are truly thankful for your appreciation! We appreciate you and look forward to seeing and working with you any time in the future!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Marian Humphries
text: I bought a very nice rug from a very nice family owned store!

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Humphries,
Thank you for the kind words over our family business.  We enjoyed meeting and working with you and Mr. Humphries in searching out your absolutely stunning Oushak Oriental Rug!  Let us know if you should need anything further and we will be more than happy to serve!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Collie Dickinson
text: I have been a customer of Nilipour's since 1985 and have had only first rate service from their entire staff. Their knowledge, selection and quality of rugs is unmatched in my decorating experience. The exceptional care taken with cleaning and repairing a very old and loved rug inherited from my grandmother is confirmation of their commitment to their customers. When in the market for a quality rug, or need a rug of quality cleaned or repaired, one could not do better than the Nilipour family.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Dickinson,
Thank you for your kind review and sweet words over our business!  We have enjoyed working with you and your husband over the many years you have been coming into our showroom...  You have been such a delight to work with whether on projects for you, personally, or enhancing the homes and business of others with your interior decorating talents!  We also appreciate your coming back and trusting us to care for your rugs in the way of cleaning, repairing, restoring, scotchgarding, mothproofing and enzyme treating of your oriental rugs!  Thank you again and, as always, please let us know if you need anything further!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Susan Gagne
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff ! I was very pleased either the cleaning and repair work done on my rug. Services were well done and timely ! Will be going back.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Gagne,
Thank you for your kind words.  We enjoyed meeting and working with you in the process of having your rug cleaned, mothproofed, scotch garded and restored.  We hope you have found a beautiful place to use and enjoy it!  We really do have a passion for rugs and for the caring of them as well.  Let us know if you need anything further and we will look forward to serving you in the future, whether it is with rug cleaning or purchasing from our showroom.
Many Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Eric Riddle
text: Excellent selection of rugs, high quality, very competitive prices, and wonderful customer service and support! Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review!  We appreciate your taking the time to come into our showroom.  We enjoyed meeting and working with you.  We hope you enjoy the beautiful rugs you selected and we will look forward to serving and working with you once again.  Thank you, The Nilipour Family

name: Brian Gambrell
text: In addition to the great selection of hand made oriental rugs, the staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  I highy recommend Nilipour.

resp.text: Thank you for your very kind words!  You and your wife were a joy to work with and I'll look forward to working with you again!

name: Sarah Ball
text: Soraya and her team made our expierence so easy and stress free! She never once gave up on me and never made me feel insignificant because of my budget! She promised me she would find exactly what I wanted and needed and she did just that. She never pressured me or talked down to me. She let me try rugs at home and never made me feel silly when I brought them back- she just went back to the drawing board! Their prices are so affordable yet reasonable for the quality products they are delivering! We will be back for sure!

resp.text:
Dear Sweet Sarah!  Thank you for your kind review and sweet words over our business!  You were a delight to work with and we look forward to serving you anytime...  Remember, we are full service and will take good care of you in the  cleaning, repairing, restoring, scotchgarding, mothproofing and enzyme treating of your oriental rugs!  Enjoy your rug and let us know if you need anything further!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Kaylee Gunn
text: Great service and cleaned our oriental rug beautifully!

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Gunn,
Thank you for the kind review!  We are thrilled you are satisfied with the cleaning of you oriental rug.  We appreciate the opportunity and hope you and your family enjoy it freshly cleaned!  Please let us know if you ever need anything further and we will be happy to serve.
Many Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Ronnie Griffin
text: Wish more businesses and people were like this. Super service and super people. This the plcce to go for purchase or cleaning of your rug.

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Griffin,
Thank you for your very genuine 5 star review!  We enjoyed working with you in the purchase of your oriental rug as well as in the servicing of your oriental rugs.  It is such a delight to be recognized as doing a good job with what we do!  We love serving in our family business and hope that we can provide excellence in customer service as well as in the products that we carry!  It's people like you, Mr. Griffin that truly make us want to come to work each day and serve!
Many Thanks and Blessings to you,
The Nilipour Family

name: Delbert Hiestand
text: Friendly,helpful, enthusiastic and very knowledgeable!

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Hiestand,
Thank you for such kind words over our family business!  We have enjoyed meeting and working with you on the occasions you have come into our showroom.  We have a passion for oriental rugs and want to share our knowledge with others in any way possible!  Forty seven years in business has given us a solid foundation of experience but we gain more wisdom every week and look forward to employing that information throughout our process of rug cleaning or in how we show our inventory of rugs to customers!  Thank you again and come again!
Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Sigurd Olsen
text: They have the  best rug

resp.text:
Thank you Mr. Olsen for the kind 5 Star Rating!  We do our best to make sure you are pleased and satisfied with our efforts.  Whether it be with our customer service or with the cleaning, mothproofing, scotch guarding, enzyme treating, appraising, and restoration or even in the purchase of your oriental rug!  We are glad you shared your great experience and hope to serve you again!
Many Blessings,
The Nilipour Family

name: Tanisha Foster
text: I was in awe at the selections presented in this store.  If your needs are custom chairs, tables and upholstery,  this is a place to start.  There were a few brands that were new to me, but they didn't fail my appetite for uniqueness.  If you are a lover of all things untraditional,  you will not be disappointed. This is the place for you.

name: Paula Shea
text: Have picked up several pieces here. Doug is great to work with and everything there is extremely helpful.

name: Nicole Faulkner
text: Doug was very knowledgeable  about Stressless chairs.  He helped us choose the perfect color to coordinate with our current furniture. The business has a promotion when you donate to the North Alabama Food Bank.

name: Jane Young
text:
Stressless recliners were introduce to me by my son. Checked on internet for a store that sold stressless and the Huntsville store was on list. Visited store on a Sunday to purchase a chair. Rod was the salesman. Could not have ask for better service. Both gentlemen were very helpful.
Cannot wait to get my chair and enjoy it. Highly recommend the store if you are looking for great service and quality furniture.

resp.text: Jane- Thank you so much for taking the time to give our team a great review. We hope you and family enjoy your Stressless Chair for years to come! We appreciate your business and are happy to help you in the future for any of your furniture needs.

name: Bree k
text: Looks a lot better than the old store that was in it's place 👍🏻

resp.text: Thank you Bree. We love being part of the Huntsville community. Visit often, we have new arrivals monthly!

name: Maggie Moon
text: Very nice furniture store, and helpful friendly staff.

resp.text: Maggie- Thank you for taking the time to give us a positive review. We really appreciate it!

name: Susan Levine
text: Beautiful store and furniture, Great lines. The staff is knowledgeable and not pushy at all.   You feel like they are there to help... not to make a sale!

resp.text: Susan- Thank you so much for your kind review! We love our team and are happy that you had a relaxed shopping experience. We are here to help and love what we do!

name: Kenny W
text: Bought a very expensive Stickley Leopold Chair.  Rarely used, it lost a tuck button in an area not subjected to direct contact.  Disappointed that Stickley, touted for high quality, produced such a product and does not warranty its upholstery.  Nonetheless Townhouse Galleries' owner told me they would fix it regardless of Stinkley's lack of warranty.  Good place to do buiness!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kenny! We appreciate your business and willingness to let us offer the customer service you deserve. We hope you enjoy your Leopold Chair for years to come.

name: Leonard Girard
text: Very  expensive my budget won't come close to those prices.  Guess we  will lower our expectation .

resp.text: Leonard- Thank you for visiting Townhouse Galleries. We are sorry you were not able to find value in the quality of the furniture we offer here in North Alabama. Our furniture is expected to last for many years and we hope that makes our customers feel comfortable in their investment. Again, thank you for visiting and we hope you enjoyed the time that you were in the store. If you have a specific budget in mind for your furniture we would be happy to see if we can find something that would fit.

name: Jimmy McMurry
text: Great place bring your wallet

resp.text: Thank you Jimmy! We hope all of our clients understand the quality of the furniture and service we offer!

name: Carmen M
text: Had to edit. Will be revise.

resp.text: Carmen, we are sorry you feel that our store didn't meet your expectations. We would love an opportunity to get it right. Please feel free to reach out to one of our owners if you need further assistance.
